topic.title: Tx to Rx Loopback after Tx Controller

body.p: This loopback replaces the data bus coming into the Receive Controller with the data bus exiting the Transmit Controller. The data from the DCPB optionally has channels filtered out at the switch for test packet traffic monitoring, and then optionally has channels merged in for test packet traffic generation, and then goes through the Transmit Controller processing before it is looped back. The Transmit Controller flow control logic supports optional DCPB fill level observance in addition to the standard Interlaken flow control status observance as it generates backpressure to the DCPB and test packet generator channel sources.
